Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone,

My name is Brophy and I have been using KSP since 0.15, so not all that long but it has taken quite a toll on my time.

I haven't posted prior to now, but I thought it was about time to announce my addiction.

It is a great game and I eagerly look forward to each update, and many of the superb mods and parts that have been developed by the community.

Keep up the great work.

- Brophy.

Hello and welcome.

Remember, there is not such thing as too many boosters.

Welcome to the forums, Brophy.

You were playing KSP since 0.15, I consider that a long time as I joined two months ago in 0.16 so I'm newer than you.

Good job you stopped lurking, now you can engage in conversations here.

Have fun playing KSP and go blow up some rockets!
